categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Ox was a BFF-1 bulk freighter that served with the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War .

The vessel was part of a Rebel convoy, escorted by the CR90 corvettes Wolf, which contained supplies that were intended to aid in the establishing of a new base. However, the ships were attacked by the Imperial EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Red Wind. However, the freighter managed to escape thanks to the efforts of Rebel pilot Keyan Farlander.
